string.value: URAGIRIMONO|Wakatta yo, doruido! Koko de, dare ga kono chikyuu-joo de hooritsu o seitei suru kengen o motte iru ka ga wakarimasu. Watashitachi no kyoodai-tachi o hakugai shita daishoo o haratte kurerudeshou.

DORUIDO|Sore de, anata wa watashi o damashita nodesu ne... Watashi wa anata o sememasen, nazenara anata wa jibun ga nani o shite iru no ka wakatte inaikaradesu. Shikashi, bassa renai aku wa arimasen. Kore ga jinsei no hoosokudesu.
URAGIRIMONO|Kono kimuzukashii roojin no iu koto o kiku na! Uruku ni iki, sokode hooshuu o uketorimasu.
|Soredewa mata.
|Tsuini shima ni toochaku shimashita. Koko ni hito ga doko ni sunde iru no ka shirimasen ka?
RISA|Koko ni nan'ninka no shiriai ga imasuga, karera wa anata o tasukete kure-soo ni arimasen.
|Karera wa darena no?
RISA|Haranbanjoona kako o motsu kyuuyuu-tachi. Watashi wa tada karera no tokoro ni iku dakedesu.
RISA|Ima wa watashi nashide itte kudasai. Watashi ga hitsuyoona toki wa, karera no naka kara watashi o sagashite kudasai.
HANGYAKU-SHA|Hashirou, motto hayaku! Watashitachi wa mada jibun jishin o sukuu koto ga dekimasu!

NANMIN|Watashitachi o sukutte kudasai, zenryoona hito! Watashitachiha kikai suuhai-sha no fukeina shinkoo o ukeireru koto o kyohi shimashita. Ima, watashitachiha okoreru itan-sha-tachi ni yotte doko demo owa rete imasu!
|Osoreru koto wa arimasen, kyoodai-tachi! Chikara o awasete koogeki o gekitai shimashou! Buki o te ni dekiru mono wa tatakawa sete kudasai!
NANMIN|Kootai wa yamete kudasai! Tatakai o idomu toki ga kita!
|Watashitachiha koogeki o gekitai shimashitaga, itan-sha ga modotte kuru kamo shiremasen. Sassoku Setto e ikimashou! Sono kabe no ushirode wa dare mo watashitachi ni furemasen!
NANMIN|Tasuketekurete arigatoo, ii hitoda yo! Anata wa watashitachi ni ashita e no kiboo o ataete kuremashita.
|Karera o mamorenakatta nda! Hazukashiidesu ne...
|Zendaimimon no kuruma to wa? Doruido soo-tachi ga naze osorete ita no ka ga wakarimashita. Sono imawashii kooi ni torihadagatatsu.
|Monsutaa to tatakau no wa kore ga hajimetede wanai. Watashitachi no taigi wa tada, watashitachi ga katsu to iu kotodesu!
|Seiiki o bootoku suru mono-tachi wa korosa reru. Doruido soo ni modoru koto ga dekimasu.
|Inori no ishi wa oka reta, hahanarudaichi no ikari ga monsutaa no sookutsu to tomoni watashi ni furikakaru mae ni, koko kara nigenakereba naranai.
|Karoojite ikinokotta. Kore ga shizen no chikaradesu.
|Watashitachiha Setto ni modori, shikoo no doruido no me ni jibun jishin o seitoo-ka suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Kono eria o hanaretaidesu ka?
Kono michi ga doko ni tsudzuite iru no ka wakaranainode, koko ni tomarimasu.
|Nani ka kimyoona basho. Koko kara hanareta hoo ga ii yo.
